reviews.text:
Food is delicious with Home style cooking and flavours. Lite on stomach and satisfying in taste buds.. have tried good few a times and never disappointed with the quality of food.
Very good option for Indian food in Tampines Central Area, please hop in to taste quality food with service.

So far great experience for me, never a disappointment. I would highly recommend for South indian meal, Kothu chicken, Tandoori chicken, Kothu Partha, Murtabak.

29 Apr 2025:
I just want to comment again,indeed a hidden gem. Veg south indian meals and boneless chicken and mutton is awesome. Honestly you don't need more that for good lunch.
Overpriced Indian food , charge 50cents for curry and look at the sad looking so called omelette that cost $2.80, recommend to only eat their prata.

I thought of trying chicken Biryani, and they had seeraga samaba biryani as today's special, however, the rice was little undercooked otherwise all good. Personally I really liked the taste, flavour and quality. Also, tried chicken fry, which is also very good. Menu is limited, because of their new setup, hope they come up many items soon.

Good service and will look to visit again.

Although their menu is limited, this stall met our expectations as someone who prefers crispy prata over chewy ones. Not only were the pratas crispy, but they were also more aromatic than the ones in the neighbourhood. For an extra $1, you can get their freshly brewed masala milk tea, which we enjoyed as well. The owners were friendly, inquired about our preferred sugar level for the drink, and also sought feedback on their food. We definitely see ourselves coming back for more.
